name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Biden officially signed a bill banning TikTok unless ByteDance agrees to sell the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 22, at the Mineral Bureau Hospital in Fushun, Liaoning Province, an elderly woman in a wheelchair was protesting her rights at the hospital. She said she became paralyzed after undergoing surgery at the hospital, but the hospital ignored her and she couldn’t find a doctor. The doctor also took a 3,200 yuan red envelope. The hospital then asked the elderly woman to leave and formed a human wall to keep her out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 19, Shanghai Cyberspace Administration issued the following statement: Self-media shall not conduct news supervision reports involving enterprises in violation of regulations. They shall not fabricate and hype infringing information involving enterprises to seek profits, actively convey positive energy, and jointly protect Shanghai's good business environment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tiktok CEO Zhou Shouzi released a video saying that we are not going anywhere.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 24, tens of thousands of netizens collectively gave a thumbs up under a news report that the United States passed a bill to aid Ukraine, Israel, and Taiwan with a high vote.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many recent graduates on social media revealed that Tesla’s global layoffs have laid off all of this year’s domestic spring recruits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 23, the British Prime Minister listed China as an authoritarian country.
The spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK strongly condemned the remarks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A notice posted near Barkhor Street in the ancient city of Lhasa: According to the requirements of the ancient city management committee: All rooftops in the ancient city must be controlled from 22:30 to 9:00 the next morning. Please do not gather here to chat/make noise after 22:30.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/6ZWwQuw3NA

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 25, Xinhuanet published a commentary titled "Inappropriate "Prevention and Control" Should Be Retreated", pointing out that some departments and units carried out prevention and control on the grounds of "convenient management" or "avoiding risks", and "replaced management with restrictions" on the grounds of "fear of accidents". 
Hu Xitui expressed his support for this in a post

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 24, Shangrao, Jiangxi. An 80-year-old man set up a stall at the entrance of the vegetable market and was charged 10 yuan for the stall by the management.
The person who filmed the video said that the old man sold some bamboo shoots and eggs at the entrance of the vegetable market, and only made 8 yuan a day, which was not enough to pay the stall fee. Passersby saw this and bought the old man's vegetables.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 23, People's Daily Online released a video about the "Vermilion Hummingbird" in Zhejiang. It was captioned: The Vermilion Hummingbird is a bird that can "change faces in Sichuan Opera, changing into nine faces in one minute." Then the topic #朱红蜂鸟一分钟能变９脸# became a hot search on Weibo, and many media and big Vs such as Xinhuanet and Jimu News forwarded it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of April 25, the Huanggang Village ancestral hall was demolished. During the day, people continued to sit in protest on the roadside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In recent days, students at many universities in the United States have launched protests. The main demands of the students include a ceasefire in Gaza, an end to US military aid to Israel, and the university's severance of ties with Israeli academic institutions and a commitment to divestment of Israeli-related entities.
On Wednesday, police clashed with students and protesters on the campus of the University of Southern California. According to the Los Angeles Police Department, as of 10 p.m., about 93 people were arrested

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Tianjin Bubble Island Music Festival caused controversy because it invited Taiwanese singer Tian Fuzhen. A large number of netizens left messages on the official Douyin account of Tianjin Culture and Tourism to boycott it and wrote letters to the relevant departments because of its stance on Taiwan.
On April 24, some netizens said that after reporting to the Tianjin Municipal Government, the official replied that the music festival project had been approved by the local cultural and public security departments, and the project was held in accordance with relevant regulations. This move once again ignited the anger of netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 23. Jinan, Shandong. A student from Jinan University reported online that he was warned and punished by the school and all awards and selections were cancelled just because he hung bed curtains in the dormitory.
It is understood that many universities have recently issued regulations prohibiting private pulling and hanging of bed curtains in student dormitories.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 25, Huangye City, Hebei Province. Because the funds of the Hengda Cultural Tourism City project in Nandagang were misappropriated by the bank, the project was left unfinished due to lack of funds, and the construction unit carried out the construction in a perfunctory manner. A large number of owners gathered outside the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 24, an old man knelt down in front of the National Bureau of Letters and Calls in Beijing to defend his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 24, a retired veteran from Jilin posted a video lamenting that Ji Yunhao joined the army in 2007 and retired in 2009. He had been a soldier for 10 years but had not been able to retire. Now he has no job and is homeless. However, Ji Yunhao is doing very well. He was able to join the Public Security Bureau as a formal police officer as soon as he retired, and was later promoted to deputy section chief. He also questioned whether Ji Yunhao's academic qualifications were fake.
The veteran hopes that relevant departments can give an explanation to the veterans and the people of the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 23, Hebei. Xinle Zhong Gas has been in arrears of workers' project payments for six years. Workers put up banners outside the company to demand their hard-earned money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 25, a knife-wounding incident occurred in Zhangjiagang, Jiangsu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 24, Tongliao City, Inner Mongolia. Villagers posted a video saying: "More than 3,000 acres of fishing grounds in Xihu Village have been occupied by village cadres for more than 20 years. The government refused to accept our appeal, resulting in more than 6,000 acres of land not being prepared for spring ploughing in time and currently being left uncultivated."
In the video, villagers collapsed in the field and cried, "You say you are for the people, but you are killing the people? We have been waiting for more than a month. Will you let the people live?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 25, in Jinzhou City, Hebei Province, owners of Country Garden Phase 4 gathered outside the Jinzhou Municipal Party Committee and held up banners to protest their rights because the developer refused to deliver the houses. During the protest, a staff member came forward and tried to tear down the banners.
